name: Time Sinking
description:
We made this game for a game jam named BOOOM from Gcore.com. It took a total of 16 days to develop. Everyone is welcome to try it out. If you want to support us, you can also go to the event page to vote for us!

https://www.gcores.com/games/67495 

The protagonist is a soldier stationed at the space station and it just experienced a magnetic storm. After repairing the system, the central control AI issued a warning that the space station was invaded.

The protagonist needs to explore this ring-shaped space station, facing chaotic time and space, out-of-control machines and moving towards mysterious places that have not been observed.
